author: marry
title: Comment on Charles Matthews can jump higher than you by marry
text:
Tyler Ulis shared this clip of Charles Matthews taking off in the Joe Craft Center today. If you had any doubt about Matthews‚Äô hops, this should clear it all up: Lil bro not playin Mann @_JustCharles_ üê∞üê∞üê∞ pic.twitter.com/TJTqyJfj8Y 
‚Äî Tyler Ulis (@tulis3) October 1, 2015 
We also have a video from Isaiah Briscoe of the guys having fun late last night. That‚Äôs Mychal Mulder throwing it down: 
We here late night !!!! @MychalMulder @tulis3 @BeMore27 pic.twitter.com/iKLcHMIQ1a ‚Äî Young Jefe (@ZayBriscoe) October 1, 2015 
Practice officially began today. Article written by Drew Franklin I can recite every line from Forrest Gump, blindfolded. Follow me on Twitter: @DrewFranklinKSR 16 responses to ‚ÄúCharles Matthews can jump higher than you‚Äù BlueRedneck October 1, 2015 at 4:03 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Damn, now my neck is sore‚Ä¶ kentuckyjoe October 1, 2015 at 4:09 pm | Permalink | Reply 
that dunk was just NASTY! Holydunks October 1, 2015 at 4:13 pm | Permalink 
Wasn‚Äôt that Mulder? Hard to tell. Sandwich October 1, 2015 at 4:21 pm | Permalink | Reply 
They seem to be having fun with one another, all seem like really good kids. DREWBLUE October 1, 2015 at 4:38 pm | Permalink | Reply 
He got his chest above the rim. Aj007 October 1, 2015 at 4:43 pm | Permalink 
Perspective man‚Ä¶seriously. Elementary my Dear October 1, 2015 at 4:57 pm | Permalink 
Dude he is nowhere near the rim. I could get my neck ‚Äúabove the rim‚Äù if I jumped from that angle. Chest above the rim or not, major hops. MustangCat October 1, 2015 at 5:01 pm | Permalink | Reply 
If I‚Äôm not mistaken, isn‚Äôt the top of those post 12 feet? BlueRedneck October 1, 2015 at 5:30 pm | Permalink 
Mustang, depends on where you have it set, but I think they extend to that height. I guess I would expect them to have it set to the highest setting for college BB players. We use one to measure the reach of our volleyball players on our girl‚Äôs middle school team. Rarely any need to extend it above 9 feet. October 1, 2015 at 5:06 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Put derek Willis in October 1, 2015 at 7:29 pm | Permalink 
That‚Äôs some funny shit right there‚Ä¶ harry October 1, 2015 at 5:12 pm | Permalink | Reply 
man, he jumped over two of me. Air Raid October 1, 2015 at 5:26 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Sadly, since he isn‚Äôt a top 20 player, he will probably never see the floor this year. L1C4 October 1, 2015 at 9:03 pm | Permalink 
What a shitty problem to have, huh? 1-7‚Ä¶. marry October 3, 2015 at 4:43 am | Permalink | Reply 
Great article that helps me a lot. marry October 3, 2015 at 4:44 am | Permalink | Reply 
Not many people will do the workouts suggest and work hard, but if you do this jump trainer will increase your vertical substantially each time you use it. I was barely able to dunk on 9.5 but after just three hard workouts with this jump trainer from this review (o2c [.] org/vert-shock-review/) I am easily able to dunk on 9.75 feet with 10.0 to come very soon. Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
